content:
<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
  <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
  <parent>
    <artifactId>cuco.pom</artifactId>
    <groupId>at.a1ta.cuco</groupId>
    <version>2025.03.01</version>
  </parent>

  <artifactId>cuco</artifactId>
  <packaging>war</packaging>

  <dependencies>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>at.a1ta.cuco</groupId>
      <artifactId>cuco-ui-app</artifactId>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>at.a1ta.cuco</groupId>
      <artifactId>cuco-ui-mycuco</artifactId>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>at.a1ta.cuco</groupId>
      <artifactId>cuco-ui-admin</artifactId>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>at.a1ta.cuco</groupId>
      <artifactId>cuco-ui-pkb</artifactId>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>commons-collections</groupId>
      <artifactId>commons-collections</artifactId>
      <version>3.2.1</version>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>org.codehaus.janino</groupId>
      <artifactId>janino</artifactId>
      <version>2.7.5</version>
    </dependency>

    <dependency>
      <groupId>com.google.gwt</groupId>
      <artifactId>gwt-servlet</artifactId>
      <scope>runtime</scope>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>com.google.gwt</groupId>
      <artifactId>gwt-user</artifactId>
      <scope>provided</scope>
    </dependency>
  </dependencies>

  <properties>
    <webappDirectory>${project.build.directory}/${project.build.finalName}</webappDirectory>
    <application.version>${project.version}</application.version>
    <buildNumber>DEV</buildNumber>
  </properties>

  <build>
    <plugins>
      <plugin>
        <groupId>org.codehaus.mojo</groupId>
        <artifactId>gwt-maven-plugin</artifactId>
        <executions>
          <execution>
            <configuration>
              <extraJvmArgs>-Xmx4096m -Xms1024M -Dgwt.usearchives=false -Djava.io.tmpdir=${project.build.directory}</extraJvmArgs>
            </configuration>
            <goals>
              <goal>resources</goal>
              <goal>compile</goal>
            </goals>
          </execution>
        </executions>
      </plugin>
      <plugin>
        <groupId>org.codehaus.mojo</groupId>
        <artifactId>buildnumber-maven-plugin</artifactId>
        <version>1.1</version>
        <executions>
          <execution>
            <phase>validate</phase>
            <goals>
              <goal>create</goal>
            </goals>
          </execution>
        </executions>
        <configuration>
          <revisionOnScmFailure>local-scm</revisionOnScmFailure>
          <doCheck>false</doCheck>
          <doUpdate>false</doUpdate>
          <providerImplementations>
            <svn>javasvn</svn>
          </providerImplementations>
        </configuration>
      </plugin>
      <plugin>
        <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
        <artifactId>maven-release-plugin</artifactId>
        <version>2.2.1</version>
        <configuration>
          <workingDirectory>./${project.artifactId}</workingDirectory>
        </configuration>
      </plugin>

    </plugins>

    <finalName>cuco</finalName>
    <!-- Generate compiled stuff in the folder used for developing mode -->
    <outputDirectory>${webappDirectory}/WEB-INF/classes</outputDirectory>
    <pluginManagement>
      <plugins>
        <!--This plugin's configuration is used to store Eclipse m2e settings only. It has no influence on the Maven build itself.-->
        <plugin>
          <groupId>org.eclipse.m2e</groupId>
          <artifactId>lifecycle-mapping</artifactId>
          <version>1.0.0</version>
          <configuration>
            <lifecycleMappingMetadata>
              <pluginExecutions>
                <pluginExecution>
                  <pluginExecutionFilter>
                    <groupId>org.codehaus.mojo</groupId>
                    <artifactId>gwt-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                    <versionRange>[2.5.1,)</versionRange>
                    <goals>
                      <goal>resources</goal>
                    </goals>
                  </pluginExecutionFilter>
                  <action>
                    <ignore></ignore>
                  </action>
                </pluginExecution>
              </pluginExecutions>
            </lifecycleMappingMetadata>
          </configuration>
        </plugin>
      </plugins>
    </pluginManagement>
  </build>

  <profiles>
    <profile>
      <id>untrusted</id>
      <activation>
        <property>
          <name>spring.profile</name>
          <value>UNTRUSTED</value>
        </property>
      </activation>
      <build>
        <plugins>
          <plugin>
            <artifactId>maven-war-plugin</artifactId>
            <configuration>
              <packagingExcludes>
                admin.html,
                pkb.html
              </packagingExcludes>
            </configuration>
          </plugin>
        </plugins>
      </build>
    </profile>
    <profile>
      <id>jenkins</id>
      <activation>
        <property>
          <name>BUILD_NUMBER</name>
        </property>
      </activation>
      <build>
        <plugins>
          <plugin>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-antrun-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>1.7</version>
            <executions>
              <execution>
                <phase>generate-resources</phase>
                <configuration>
                  <target>
                    <copy file="src/main/filters/gwt/AdminStarter.gwt.xml" tofile="src/main/resources/at/a1ta/cuco/admin/starter/AdminStarter.gwt.xml" />
                    <copy file="src/main/filters/gwt/AppStarter.gwt.xml" tofile="src/main/resources/at/a1ta/cuco/app/starter/AppStarter.gwt.xml" />
                    <copy file="src/main/filters/gwt/MyCuCoStarter.gwt.xml" tofile="src/main/resources/at/a1ta/cuco/mycuco/starter/MyCuCoStarter.gwt.xml" />
                    <copy file="src/main/filters/gwt/PkbStarter.gwt.xml" tofile="src/main/resources/at/a1ta/pkb/starter/PkbStarter.gwt.xml" />
                  </target>
                </configuration>
                <goals>
                  <goal>run</goal>
                </goals>
              </execution>
            </executions>
          </plugin>
        </plugins>
      </build>
    </profile>
    
    <profile>
      <id>deployDev</id>
      <activation>
        <property>
          <name>env</name>
          <value>dev</value>
        </property>
      </activation>
      <build>
        <filters>
          <filter>src/main/filters/configuration.dev11.properties</filter>
        </filters>
        <plugins>
          <!-- plugin>
            <groupId>org.codehaus.mojo</groupId>
            <artifactId>wagon-maven-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>2.0.0</version>
            <executions>
              <execution>
                <phase>install</phase>
                <goals>
                  <goal>sshexec</goal>
                </goals>
                <configuration>
                  <runIf>{{ true }}</runIf>
                  <location>scp://tomcat:bqNkUS3$@vlcucod001.at.inside:/srv/tomcat7_jvm1/bin</location>
                  <echoCommands>true</echoCommands>
                  <commands>
                    <command>./shutdown-jvm1.sh</command>
                    <command>sleep 60</command>
                    <command>cd ../webapps</command>
                    <command>rm -rf ROOT</command>
                    <command>rm ../webapps-old/ROOT.war.old</command>
                    <command>mv ROOT.war ../webapps-old/ROOT.war.old</command>
                    <command>cd ../bin</command>
                    <command>./startup-jvm1.sh</command>
                    <command>sleep 90</command>
                  </commands>
                  <failOnError>false</failOnError>
                </configuration>
              </execution>
            </executions> 
          </plugin-->
          <plugin>
            <groupId>org.apache.tomcat.maven</groupId>
            <artifactId>tomcat7-maven-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>2.2</version>
            <configuration>
              <url>http://vlcucod001.at.inside:7180/manager/text</url>
              <server>tomcat-dev</server>
              <path>/</path>
              <username>admin2</username>
              <password>ultrix</password>
            </configuration>
            <executions>
              <execution>
                <phase>install</phase>
                <goals>
                  <goal>deploy</goal>
                </goals>
              </execution>
            </executions>
          </plugin>
          <plugin>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-release-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>2.2.1</version>
            <configuration>
              <workingDirectory>./${project.artifactId}</workingDirectory>
            </configuration>
          </plugin>
          <plugin>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-war-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>2.1.1</version>
            <configuration>
              <webXml>src/main/filters/web-internal.xml</webXml>
              <filteringDeploymentDescriptors>true</filteringDeploymentDescriptors>
              <webResources>
                <resource>
                  <directory>src/main/filters</directory>
                  <targetPath>WEB-INF/classes</targetPath>
                  <filtering>true</filtering>
                  <includes>
                    <include>configuration.properties</include>
                    <include>logback.xml</include>
                    <include>versions.properties</include>
                    <include>ehcache.xml</include>
                  </includes>
                </resource>
              </webResources>
            </configuration>
          </plugin>
        </plugins>
      </build>
    </profile>

	<profile>
	<id>deployT360</id>
      <activation>
        <property>
          <name>env</name>
          <value>t360</value>
        </property>
      </activation>
      <build>
        <filters>
          <filter>src/main/filters/configuration.t360.properties</filter>
        </filters>
        <plugins>
          <plugin>
            <groupId>com.github.goldin</groupId>
            <artifactId>sshexec-maven-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>0.2.5</version>
            <executions>
              <execution>
                <phase>install</phase>
                <goals>
                  <goal>sshexec</goal>
                </goals>
                <configuration>
                  <runIf>{{ true }}</runIf>
                  <location>scp://username:password@10.8.22.66:/srv/cuco/var/tomcat7_jvm1/bin</location>
                  <echoCommands>true</echoCommands>
                  <commands>
                    <command>./shutdown-jvm1.sh</command>
                    <command>sleep 60</command>
                    <command>rm -r /srv/tomcat7/var/tomcat7_jvm1/CustomerInventoryReqResZip/*</command>
                    <command>cd ../webapps</command>
                    <command>rm -rf cuco</command>
                    <command>rm ../webapps-old/cuco.war.old</command>
                    <command>mv cuco.war ../webapps-old/cuco.war.old</command>
                    <command>cd ../bin</command>
                    <command>./startup-jvm1.sh</command>
                    <command>sleep 90</command>
                  </commands>
                  <failOnError>false</failOnError>
                </configuration>
              </execution>
            </executions>
          </plugin>
          <plugin>
            <groupId>org.apache.tomcat.maven</groupId>
            <artifactId>tomcat7-maven-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>2.2</version>
            <configuration>
              <url>http://10.8.22.66:8102/manager/html</url>
              <server>tomcat-t360</server>
              <path>/${project.build.finalName}</path>
            </configuration>
            <executions>
              <execution>
                <phase>install</phase>
                <goals>
                  <goal>deploy</goal>
                </goals>
              </execution>
            </executions>
          </plugin>
          <plugin>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-release-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>2.2.1</version>
            <configuration>
              <workingDirectory>./${project.artifactId}</workingDirectory>
            </configuration>
          </plugin>
          <plugin>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-war-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>2.1.1</version>
            <configuration>
              <webXml>src/main/filters/web-ntlm.xml</webXml>
              <filteringDeploymentDescriptors>true</filteringDeploymentDescriptors>
              <webResources>
                <resource>
                  <directory>src/main/filters</directory>
                  <targetPath>WEB-INF/classes</targetPath>
                  <filtering>true</filtering>
                  <includes>
                    <include>configuration.properties</include>
                    <include>logback.xml</include>
                    <include>versions.properties</include>
                    <include>ehcache.xml</include>
                  </includes>
                </resource>
              </webResources>
            </configuration>
          </plugin>
        </plugins>
      </build>
    </profile>

    <profile>
      <id>deployInt</id>
      <activation>
        <property>
          <name>env</name>
          <value>int</value>
        </property>
      </activation>
      <build>
        <filters>
          <filter>src/main/filters/configuration.int11.properties</filter>
        </filters>
        <plugins>
          <plugin>
            <groupId>com.github.goldin</groupId>
            <artifactId>sshexec-maven-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>0.2.5</version>
            <executions>
              <execution>
                <phase>install</phase>
                <goals>
                  <goal>sshexec</goal>
                </goals>
                <configuration>
                  <runIf>{{ true }}</runIf>
                  <location>scp://tomcat:B,HK3AQQl$Z3@vlcucoi001.at.inside:/srv/tomcat7_jvm1/bin</location>
                  <echoCommands>true</echoCommands>
                  <commands>
                    <command>./shutdown-jvm1.sh</command>
                    <command>sleep 60</command>
                    <command>rm -r /srv/tomcat7_jvm1/CustomerInventoryReqResZip/*</command>
                    <command>cd ../webapps</command>
                    <command>rm -rf ROOT</command>
                    <command>rm ../webapps-old/ROOT.war.old</command>
                    <command>mv ROOT.war ../webapps-old/ROOT.war.old</command>
                    <command>cd ../bin</command>
                    <command>./startup-jvm1.sh</command>
                    <command>sleep 90</command>
                  </commands>
                  <failOnError>false</failOnError>
                </configuration>
              </execution>
            </executions>
          </plugin>
          <plugin>
            <groupId>org.apache.tomcat.maven</groupId>
            <artifactId>tomcat7-maven-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>2.2</version>
            <configuration>
              <url>http://vlcucoi001.at.inside:7180/manager/html</url>
              <server>tomcat-int</server>
              <path>/</path>
              <username>admin2</username>
              <password>ultrix</password>
            </configuration>
            <executions>
              <execution>
                <phase>install</phase>
                <goals>
                  <goal>redeploy</goal>
                </goals>
              </execution>
            </executions>
          </plugin>
          <plugin>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-release-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>2.2.1</version>
            <configuration>
              <workingDirectory>./${project.artifactId}</workingDirectory>
            </configuration>
          </plugin>
          <plugin>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-war-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>2.1.1</version>
            <configuration>
              <webXml>src/main/filters/web-internal.xml</webXml>
              <filteringDeploymentDescriptors>true</filteringDeploymentDescriptors>
              <webResources>
                <resource>
                  <directory>src/main/filters</directory>
                  <targetPath>WEB-INF/classes</targetPath>
                  <filtering>true</filtering>
                  <includes>
                    <include>configuration.properties</include>
                    <include>logback.xml</include>
                    <include>versions.properties</include>
                    <include>ehcache.xml</include>
                  </includes>
                </resource>
              </webResources>
            </configuration>
          </plugin>
        </plugins>
      </build>
    </profile>

    <profile>
      <id>deployInt-ext</id>
      <activation>
        <property>
          <name>env</name>
          <value>int-ext</value>
        </property>
      </activation>
      <build>
        <filters>
          <filter>src/main/filters/configuration.int11-ext.properties</filter>
        </filters>
        <plugins>
          <plugin>
            <groupId>com.github.goldin</groupId>
            <artifactId>sshexec-maven-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>0.2.5</version>
            <executions>
              <execution>
                <phase>install</phase>
                <goals>
                  <goal>sshexec</goal>
                </goals>
                <configuration>
                  <runIf>{{ true }}</runIf>
                  <location>scp://tomcat:B,HK3AQQl$Z3@vlcucoi003.at.inside:/srv/tomcat7_jvm1/bin</location>
                  <echoCommands>true</echoCommands>
                  <commands>
                    <command>./shutdown-jvm1.sh</command>
                    <command>sleep 90</command>
                    <command>rm -r /srv/tomcat7_jvm1/CustomerInventoryReqResZip/*</command>
                    <command>cd ../webapps</command>
                    <command>rm -rf ROOT</command>
                    <command>rm ROOT.war</command>
                    <command>cd ../bin</command>
                    <command>./startup-jvm1.sh</command>
                    <command>sleep 120</command>
                  </commands>
                </configuration>
              </execution>
            </executions>
          </plugin>
          <plugin>
            <groupId>org.apache.tomcat.maven</groupId>
            <artifactId>tomcat7-maven-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>2.2</version>
            <configuration>
              <url>http://vlcucoi003.at.inside:7280/manager/html</url>
              <server>tomcat-int-ext</server>
              <path>/</path>
              <username>admin2</username>
              <password>ultrix</password>
            </configuration>
            <executions>
              <execution>
                <phase>install</phase>
                <goals>
                  <goal>redeploy</goal>
                </goals>
              </execution>
            </executions>
          </plugin>
          <plugin>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-release-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>2.2.1</version>
            <configuration>
              <workingDirectory>./${project.artifactId}</workingDirectory>
            </configuration>
          </plugin>
          <plugin>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-war-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>2.1.1</version>
            <configuration>
              <webXml>src/main/filters/web-external.xml</webXml>
              <filteringDeploymentDescriptors>true</filteringDeploymentDescriptors>
              <webResources>
                <resource>
                  <directory>src/main/filters</directory>
                  <targetPath>WEB-INF/classes</targetPath>
                  <filtering>true</filtering>
                  <includes>
                    <include>configuration.properties</include>
                    <include>logback.xml</include>
                    <include>versions.properties</include>
                    <include>ehcache.xml</include>
                  </includes>
                </resource>
              </webResources>
            </configuration>
          </plugin>
        </plugins>
      </build>
    </profile>

    <profile>
      <id>deployE2E</id>
      <activation>
        <property>
          <name>env</name>
          <value>e2e</value>
        </property>
      </activation>
      <build>
        <filters>
          <filter>src/main/filters/configuration.e2e11.properties</filter>
        </filters>
        <plugins>
          <plugin>
            <groupId>com.github.goldin</groupId>
            <artifactId>sshexec-maven-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>0.2.5</version>
            <executions>
              <execution>
                <phase>install</phase>
                <goals>
                  <goal>sshexec</goal>
                </goals>
                <configuration>
                  <runIf>{{ true }}</runIf>
                  <location>scp://tomcat:PhnmAt2i_EpKy#@vlcucok001.at.inside:/srv/tomcat7_jvm1/bin</location>
                  <echoCommands>true</echoCommands>
                  <commands>
                    <command>./shutdown-jvm1.sh</command>
                    <command>sleep 60</command>
                    <command>rm -r /srv/tomcat7_jvm1/CustomerInventoryReqResZip/*</command>
                    <command>cd ../webapps</command>
                    <command>rm -rf ROOT</command>
                    <command>rm ../webapps-old/ROOT.war.old</command>
                    <command>mv ROOT.war ../webapps-old/ROOT.war.old</command>
                    <command>cd ../bin</command>
                    <command>./startup-jvm1.sh</command>
                    <command>sleep 90</command>
                  </commands>
                  <failOnError>false</failOnError>
                </configuration>
              </execution>
            </executions>
          </plugin>
          <plugin>
            <groupId>org.apache.tomcat.maven</groupId>
            <artifactId>tomcat7-maven-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>2.2</version>
            <configuration>
              <url>http://vlcucok001.at.inside:7180/manager/text</url>
              <server>tomcat-e2e</server>
              <username>admin2</username>
              <password>ultrix</password>
              <path>/</path>
            </configuration>
            <executions>
              <execution>
                <phase>install</phase>
                <goals>
                  <goal>deploy</goal>
                </goals>
              </execution>
            </executions>
          </plugin>
          <plugin>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-release-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>2.2.1</version>
            <configuration>
              <workingDirectory>./${project.artifactId}</workingDirectory>
            </configuration>
          </plugin>
          <plugin>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-war-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>2.1.1</version>
            <configuration>
              <webXml>src/main/filters/web-internal.xml</webXml>
              <filteringDeploymentDescriptors>true</filteringDeploymentDescriptors>
              <webResources>
                <resource>
                  <directory>src/main/filters</directory>
                  <targetPath>WEB-INF/classes</targetPath>
                  <filtering>true</filtering>
                  <includes>
                    <include>configuration.properties</include>
                    <include>logback.xml</include>
                    <include>versions.properties</include>
                    <include>ehcache.xml</include>
                  </includes>
                </resource>
              </webResources>
            </configuration>
          </plugin>
        </plugins>
      </build>
    </profile>
    
    <profile>
      <id>buildProd</id>
      <activation>
        <property>
          <name>env</name>
          <value>prod-intern</value>
        </property>
      </activation>
      <build>
        <filters>
          <filter>src/main/filters/configuration.prod11.properties</filter>
        </filters>
        <plugins>
          <plugin>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-release-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>2.2.1</version>
            <configuration>
              <workingDirectory>./${project.artifactId}</workingDirectory>
              <goals>package</goals>
            </configuration>
          </plugin>
          <plugin>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-war-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>2.1.1</version>
            <configuration>
              <warName>${project.build.finalName}-${env}-${project.version}</warName>
              <webXml>src/main/filters/web-internal.xml</webXml>
              <filteringDeploymentDescriptors>true</filteringDeploymentDescriptors>
              <webResources>
                <resource>
                  <directory>src/main/filters</directory>
                  <targetPath>WEB-INF/classes</targetPath>
                  <filtering>true</filtering>
                  <includes>
                    <include>configuration.properties</include>
                    <include>logback.xml</include>
                    <include>versions.properties</include>
                    <include>ehcache.xml</include>
                  </includes>
                </resource>
              </webResources>
            </configuration>
          </plugin>
        </plugins>
      </build>
    </profile>
    <profile>
      <id>buildProd-ext</id>
      <activation>
        <property>
          <name>env</name>
          <value>prod-extern</value>
        </property>
      </activation>
      <build>
        <filters>
          <filter>src/main/filters/configuration.prod11.properties</filter>
          <filter>src/main/filters/configuration.prod11-ext.properties</filter>
        </filters>
        <plugins>
          <plugin>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-release-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>2.2.1</version>
            <configuration>
              <workingDirectory>./${project.artifactId}</workingDirectory>
              <goals>package</goals>
            </configuration>
          </plugin>
          <plugin>
            <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-war-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>2.1.1</version>
            <configuration>
              <warName>${project.build.finalName}-${env}-${project.version}</warName>
              <webXml>src/main/filters/web-external.xml</webXml>
              <filteringDeploymentDescriptors>true</filteringDeploymentDescriptors>
              <webResources>
                <resource>
                  <directory>src/main/filters</directory>
                  <targetPath>WEB-INF/classes</targetPath>
                  <filtering>true</filtering>
                  <includes>
                    <include>configuration.properties</include>
                    <include>logback.xml</include>
                    <include>versions.properties</include>
                    <include>ehcache.xml</include>
                  </includes>
                </resource>
              </webResources>
            </configuration>
          </plugin>
        </plugins>
      </build>
    </profile>    
  </profiles>
</project>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<!DOCTYPE configuration>
<configuration debug="true" scan="true">
  <jmxConfigurator />

       <turboFilter 
           class="ch.qos.logback.classic.turbo.DuplicateMessageFilter">
         <AllowedRepetitions>5</AllowedRepetitions>
      </turboFilter>
  <appender name="FILE" class="ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender">
    <file>${logback.file.path}</file>
    <rollingPolicy class="ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy">
      <fileNamePattern>${logback.file.path}%d{yyyy-MM-dd}</fileNamePattern>
      <maxHistory>30</maxHistory>
    </rollingPolicy>
    <filter class="ch.qos.logback.core.filter.EvaluatorFilter">
      <evaluator>        
        <expression>return throwable instanceof net.sf.ehcache.distribution.jms.InvalidJMSMessageException;</expression>
      </evaluator>
      <OnMismatch>NEUTRAL</OnMismatch>
      <OnMatch>DENY</OnMatch>
    </filter>
    <filter class="ch.qos.logback.core.filter.EvaluatorFilter">
      <evaluator>
        <expression>return message.contains("ORA-00936: missing expression");</expression>
      </evaluator>
      <OnMismatch>NEUTRAL</OnMismatch>
      <OnMatch>DENY</OnMatch>
    </filter>
    <encoder>
      <pattern>%-30(%date{ISO8601} [%thread]) %-5level %X{user} %logger{35} - %msg%n</pattern>
    </encoder>
  </appender>

  <appender name="GWT-LOGFILE" class="ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender">
    <file>${logback.gwtlog.path}</file>
    <rollingPolicy class="ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy">
      <fileNamePattern>${logback.gwtlog.path}%d{yyyy-MM-dd}</fileNamePattern>
      <maxHistory>30</maxHistory>
    </rollingPolicy>
    <encoder>
      <pattern>%-30(%date{ISO8601} [%thread]) %-5level %X{user} %logger{35} - %msg%n</pattern>
    </encoder>
  </appender>

  <appender name="SQL" class="ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender">
    <File>${logback.sql.path}</File>
    <rollingPolicy class="ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy">
      <fileNamePattern>${logback.sql.path}%d{yyyy-MM-dd}</fileNamePattern>
      <maxHistory>30</maxHistory>
    </rollingPolicy>
    <encoder>
      <pattern>%-30(%date{ISO8601} [%thread]) %-5level %X{user} %logger{35} - %msg%n</pattern>
    </encoder>
  </appender>

  <appender name="MAILINGS" class="ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender">
    <File>${logback.mailings.path}</File>
    <rollingPolicy class="ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy">
      <fileNamePattern>${logback.mailings.path}%d{yyyy-MM-dd}</fileNamePattern>
      <maxHistory>30</maxHistory>
    </rollingPolicy>
    <encoder>
      <pattern>%-30(%date{ISO8601} [%thread]) %-5level %X{user} %logger{35} - %msg%n</pattern>
    </encoder>
  </appender>
  
  <appender name="GAMIFICATION" class="ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender">
    <File>${logback.gamification.path}</File>
    <rollingPolicy class="ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy">
      <fileNamePattern>${logback.gamification.path}%d{yyyy-MM-dd}</fileNamePattern>
      <maxHistory>30</maxHistory>
    </rollingPolicy>
    <encoder>
      <pattern>%-30(%date{ISO8601} [%thread]) %-5level %X{user} %logger{35} - %msg%n</pattern>
    </encoder>
  </appender>
  
  <appender name="INVOICEDOWNLOADS" class="ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender">
    <File>${logback.invoiceaudit.path}</File>
    <rollingPolicy class="ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy">
      <fileNamePattern>${logback.invoiceaudit.path}%d{yyyy-MM-dd}</fileNamePattern>
    </rollingPolicy>
    <encoder>
      <pattern>%-30(%date{ISO8601} [%thread]) %-5level %X{user} %logger{35} - %msg%n</pattern>
    </encoder>
  </appender>

  <appender name="INVOICEPERFORMANCE" class="ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender">
    <File>${logback.invoiceperformance.path}</File>
    <rollingPolicy class="ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy">
      <fileNamePattern>${logback.invoiceperformance.path}%d{yyyy-MM-dd}</fileNamePattern>
    </rollingPolicy>
    <encoder>
      <pattern>%-30(%date{ISO8601} [%thread]) %-5level %X{user} %logger{35} - %msg%n</pattern>
    </encoder>
  </appender>

  <appender name="TRACKING" class="ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender">
    <File>${logback.tracking.path}</File>
    <rollingPolicy class="ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy">
      <fileNamePattern>${logback.tracking.path}%d{yyyy-MM-dd}</fileNamePattern>
    </rollingPolicy>
    <encoder class="ch.qos.logback.core.encoder.LayoutWrappingEncoder">
      <layout class="at.a1ta.bite.commons.logging.BiteLogEventLayout" />
    </encoder>
  </appender>

  <appender name="APPLICATION" class="ch.qos.logback.core.FileAppender">
    <File>${logback.application.path}</File>
    <encoder class="ch.qos.logback.core.encoder.LayoutWrappingEncoder">
      <layout class="at.a1ta.bite.commons.logging.BiteLogEventLayout" />
    </encoder>
  </appender>

  <appender name="REPORTING" class="ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender">
    <rollingPolicy class="ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy">
      <fileNamePattern>${logback.reporting.path}.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.log</fileNamePattern>
    </rollingPolicy>
    <encoder class="ch.qos.logback.core.encoder.LayoutWrappingEncoder">
      <layout class="at.a1ta.bite.commons.logging.BiteLogEventLayout" />
    </encoder>
  </appender>

  <appender name="AUDITLOG" class="at.a1ta.bite.audit.core.RollingFileAuditAppender">
    <!-- encoder is optional if not specified default layout will be used -->
    <encoder class="ch.qos.logback.core.encoder.LayoutWrappingEncoder">
      <layout class="at.a1ta.bite.audit.core.AuditEventLayout" />
    </encoder>

    <rollingPolicy class="ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy">
      <!-- daily rollover for local testing -->
      <fileNamePattern>${logback.audit.path}.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.log</fileNamePattern>
      <maxHistory>30</maxHistory>
    </rollingPolicy>
  </appender>

  <appender name="esb" class="ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender">
    <File>${logback.esb.path}/esb.log</File>
    <rollingPolicy class="ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy">
      <fileNamePattern>${logback.esb.path}/esb.%d{yyyy-MM-dd}.log</fileNamePattern>
    </rollingPolicy>
    <encoder>
      <pattern>%-30(%date{ISO8601} [%thread]) %-5level %X{user} %logger{35} - %msg%n</pattern>
    </encoder>
  </appender>

  <appender name="CUSCO-DUPOS" class="ch.qos.logback.core.FileAppender">
    <File>${logback.cusco-dupos.path}</File>
    <encoder class="ch.qos.logback.core.encoder.LayoutWrappingEncoder">
      <layout class="ch.qos.logback.classic.PatternLayout">
        <Pattern>
          %date{ISO8601} [%thread] %-5level %X{user} - %msg%n
        </Pattern>
      </layout>
    </encoder>
  </appender>

  <appender name="KUMS-SKZ" class="ch.qos.logback.core.FileAppender">
    <File>${logback.kumsSkz.path}</File>
    <encoder class="ch.qos.logback.core.encoder.LayoutWrappingEncoder">
      <layout class="ch.qos.logback.classic.PatternLayout">
        <Pattern>
          %date{ISO8601} [%thread] %-5level %X{user} - %msg%n
        </Pattern>
      </layout>
    </encoder>
  </appender>

  <appender name="LDAPSYNC" class="ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender">
    <file>${logback.ldapsync.path}</file>
    <rollingPolicy class="ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy">
      <fileNamePattern>${logback.ldapsync.path}%d{yyyy-MM-dd}</fileNamePattern>
      <maxHistory>30</maxHistory>
    </rollingPolicy>
    <encoder>
      <pattern>%-30(%date{ISO8601} [%thread]) %-5level %X{user} %logger{35} - %msg%n</pattern>
    </encoder>
  </appender>

  <appender name="PWUAUTH" class="ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.RollingFileAppender">
    <file>${logback.pwuauth.path}</file>
    <rollingPolicy class="ch.qos.logback.core.rolling.TimeBasedRollingPolicy">
      <fileNamePattern>${logback.pwuauth.path}%d{yyyy-MM-dd}</fileNamePattern>
      <maxHistory>30</maxHistory>
    </rollingPolicy>
    <encoder>
      <pattern>%-30(%date{ISO8601} [%thread]) %-5level %X{ip} - %msg%n</pattern>
    </encoder>
  </appender>

  <logger name="at.a1ta.bite.core.server.service.DefaultCorporateDirectorySynchronizationService" level="DEBUG" additivity="false">
    <appender-ref ref="LDAPSYNC" />
  </logger>

  <logger name="at.a1ta.cuco.core.service.impl.CustomerUnlockServiceImpl" level="DEBUG" additivity="false">
    <appender-ref ref="CUSCO-DUPOS" />
  </logger>

  <logger name="esb" level="DEBUG" additivity="false">
    <appender-ref ref="esb" />
  </logger>

  <logger name="bite-tracking" level="DEBUG" additivity="false">
    <appender-ref ref="TRACKING" />
  </logger>
  <logger name="bite-application" level="DEBUG" additivity="false">
    <appender-ref ref="APPLICATION" />
  </logger>
  <logger name="bite-reporting" level="DEBUG" additivity="false">
    <appender-ref ref="REPORTING" />
  </logger>

  <logger name="mailings" level="DEBUG" additivity="false">
    <appender-ref ref="MAILINGS" />
  </logger>

  <logger name="GAMIFICATION" level="INFO" additivity="false">
    <appender-ref ref="GAMIFICATION" />
  </logger>
  <logger name="invoicedownloads" level="DEBUG" additivity="false">
    <appender-ref ref="INVOICEDOWNLOADS" />
  </logger>

  <logger name="invoiceperformance" level="DEBUG" additivity="false">
    <appender-ref ref="INVOICEPERFORMANCE" />
  </logger>

  <logger name="jdbc.sqltiming" level="WARN" additivity="false">
    <appender-ref ref="SQL" />
  </logger>
  <logger name="jdbc" level="ERROR" additivity="false" >
    <appender-ref ref="SQL" />
  </logger>
  <logger name="gwt-log" level="ERROR" additivity="false">
    <appender-ref ref="GWT-LOGFILE" />
  </logger>

  <logger name="pwuauth" level="debug" additivity="false">
    <appender-ref ref="PWUAUTH" />
  </logger>

  <logger name="at.a1ta.pkb.service.customerinteraction.CustomerInteractionSender" level="ERROR" />

  <logger name="AUDIT" level="INFO" additivity="false">
    <appender-ref ref="AUDITLOG" />
  </logger>

  <logger name="at.a1ta.bite.core.server.service.DefaultKumsCommonService" level="TRACE" additivity="false">
    <appender-ref ref="KUMS-SKZ" />
  </logger>

  <logger name="at.a1ta.bite.core.server.dao.DefaultKumsSkzShopDao" level="TRACE" additivity="false">
    <appender-ref ref="KUMS-SKZ" />
  </logger>

  <root>
    <level value="INFO" />
    <appender-ref ref="FILE" />
  </root>
</configuration>

ai_analysis.purpose: Logging configuration for the application using Logback framework with debug and JMX monitoring enabled

components.name: DuplicateMessageFilter
components.description: Prevents log spam by limiting repeated messages

components.name: RollingFileAppender
components.description: Manages log file rotation and retention

business_rules.description: Duplicate log messages limited to 5 repetitions

security_considerations: Log file permissions must be properly configured
JMX access should be secured in production
performance_notes: Time-based rolling strategy prevents excessive file sizes

potential_issues: Variable resolution might fail if logback.file.path not set
Debug mode enabled might impact performance
improvement_suggestions: Consider adding async appender for better performance
Add error handling for file write failures

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<web-app version="3.0" xmlns="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/javaee" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/javaee http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/javaee/web-app_3_0.xsd">

  <context-param>
    <param-name>contextConfigLocation</param-name>
    <param-value>classpath:applicationContext-app.xml classpath:applicationContext-admin.xml classpath:applicationContext-mycuco.xml</param-value>
  </context-param>
  <context-param>
    <param-name>spring.profiles.active</param-name>
    <param-value>TRUSTED,DEV,JMSBROKER</param-value>
  </context-param>

  <filter>
    <filter-name>NTLM HTTP Authentication Filter</filter-name>
    <filter-class>jcifs.http.NtlmHttpFilter</filter-class>
    <init-param>
      <param-name>jcifs.smb.client.domain</param-name>
      <param-value>AUSTRIA</param-value>
    </init-param>
    <init-param>
      <param-name>jcifs.http.domainController</param-name>
      <param-value>jtsdw007.austria.local</param-value>
      <!-- param-value>jtsdw007</param-value-->
    </init-param>
    <init-param>
      <param-name>jcifs.netbios.wins</param-name>
      <param-value>10.1.20.1</param-value>
    </init-param>
  </filter>
  <filter>
    <filter-name>BITEAuthenticationFilter</filter-name>
    <filter-class>at.a1ta.bite.ui.server.filter.BiteAuthenticationFilter</filter-class>
  </filter>
  <filter>
    <filter-name>TraceFilter</filter-name>
    <filter-class>at.a1ta.bite.ui.server.filter.TraceFilter</filter-class>
  </filter>
  <filter>
    <filter-name>UserToMdcFilter</filter-name>
    <filter-class>at.a1ta.bite.ui.server.filter.UserToMdcFilter</filter-class>
  </filter>

  <filter-mapping>
    <filter-name>NTLM HTTP Authentication Filter</filter-name>
    <url-pattern>*.rpc</url-pattern>
  </filter-mapping>
  <filter-mapping>
    <filter-name>NTLM HTTP Authentication Filter</filter-name>
    <url-pattern>*.view</url-pattern>
  </filter-mapping>
  <filter-mapping>
    <filter-name>NTLM HTTP Authentication Filter</filter-name>
    <url-pattern>*.png</url-pattern>
  </filter-mapping>
  <filter-mapping>
    <filter-name>BITEAuthenticationFilter</filter-name>
    <url-pattern>*.view</url-pattern>
  </filter-mapping>
  <filter-mapping>
    <filter-name>BITEAuthenticationFilter</filter-name>
    <url-pattern>*.rpc</url-pattern>
  </filter-mapping>
  <filter-mapping>
    <filter-name>TraceFilter</filter-name>
    <url-pattern>*.png</url-pattern>
  </filter-mapping>
  <filter-mapping>
    <filter-name>UserToMdcFilter</filter-name>
    <url-pattern>*.view</url-pattern>
  </filter-mapping>
  <filter-mapping>
    <filter-name>UserToMdcFilter</filter-name>
    <url-pattern>*.rpc</url-pattern>
  </filter-mapping>

  <listener>
    <listener-class>org.springframework.web.context.ContextLoaderListener</listener-class>
  </listener>
  <listener>
    <listener-class>at.a1ta.bite.ui.server.listener.ApplicationServletContextListener</listener-class>
  </listener>
  <listener>
    <listener-class>net.sf.ehcache.constructs.web.ShutdownListener</listener-class>
  </listener>

  <!-- Default page to serve -->
  <welcome-file-list>
    <welcome-file>index.html</welcome-file>
  </welcome-file-list>

</web-app>

content:
<ehcache xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="https://www.ehcache.org/ehcache.xsd">

  <cacheManagerPeerProviderFactory
       class="net.sf.ehcache.distribution.jms.JMSCacheManagerPeerProviderFactory"
       properties="initialContextFactoryName=at.a1ta.bite.core.server.util.EhCacheReplicationActiveMQInitialContextFactory,
           providerURL=tcp://${jmsBrokerAddress}:${jmsBrokerPort},
           replicationTopicConnectionFactoryBindingName=topicConnectionFactory,
           getQueueConnectionFactoryBindingName=queueConnectionFactory,
           getQueueBindingName=ehcacheGetQueue,
           replicationTopicBindingName=ehcache"
       propertySeparator=","
       />
  
    <defaultCache
    maxElementsInMemory="10000"
    eternal="false"
    overflowToDisk="false"
    memoryStoreEvictionPolicy="LRU"
    statistics="true">
    <cacheEventListenerFactory
     class="net.sf.ehcache.distribution.jms.JMSCacheReplicatorFactory"
     properties="replicateAsynchronously=true,
                 replicatePuts=true,
                 replicateUpdates=true,
                 replicateUpdatesViaCopy=true,
                 replicateRemovals=true,
                 asynchronousReplicationIntervalMillis=1000"
      propertySeparator=","/>
  </defaultCache>
    
  <cache name="ldapCache" maxElementsInMemory="10000" overflowToDisk="false" timeToLiveSeconds="86400" eternal="false">
    <cacheEventListenerFactory
     class="net.sf.ehcache.distribution.jms.JMSCacheReplicatorFactory"
     properties="replicateAsynchronously=true,
                 replicatePuts=true,
                 replicateUpdates=true,
                 replicateUpdatesViaCopy=true,
                 replicateRemovals=true,
                 asynchronousReplicationIntervalMillis=1000"
      propertySeparator=","/>
  </cache>
  <cache name="orgUnitCache" maxElementsInMemory="10000" overflowToDisk="false" timeToLiveSeconds="86400" eternal="false">
    <cacheEventListenerFactory
     class="net.sf.ehcache.distribution.jms.JMSCacheReplicatorFactory"
     properties="replicateAsynchronously=true,
                 replicatePuts=true,
                 replicateUpdates=true,
                 replicateUpdatesViaCopy=true,
                 replicateRemovals=true,
                 asynchronousReplicationIntervalMillis=1000"
      propertySeparator=","/>
  </cache>
  <cache name="at.a1ta.cusi.bom.addresstypes.Country" maxElementsInMemory="10000" overflowToDisk="false" timeToLiveSeconds="0" eternal="true"/>
  <cache name="customerEquipmentCache" maxElementsInMemory="1000" overflowToDisk="false" timeToLiveSeconds="3600" eternal="false">
    <cacheEventListenerFactory
     class="net.sf.ehcache.distribution.jms.JMSCacheReplicatorFactory"
     properties="replicateAsynchronously=true,
                 replicatePuts=true,
                 replicateUpdates=true,
                 replicateUpdatesViaCopy=true,
                 replicateRemovals=true,
                 asynchronousReplicationIntervalMillis=1000"
      propertySeparator=","/>
  </cache>
  <cache name="phoneNumberCache" maxElementsInMemory="200" overflowToDisk="false" timeToLiveSeconds="36000" eternal="false">
    <cacheEventListenerFactory
     class="net.sf.ehcache.distribution.jms.JMSCacheReplicatorFactory"
     properties="replicateAsynchronously=true,
                 replicatePuts=true,
                 replicateUpdates=true,
                 replicateUpdatesViaCopy=true,
                 replicateRemovals=true,
                 asynchronousReplicationIntervalMillis=1000"
      propertySeparator=","/>
  </cache>
  <cache name="VIPCache" maxElementsInMemory="2000" overflowToDisk="false" timeToLiveSeconds="86400" eternal="false"/>
  <cache name="mobilPoints" maxElementsInMemory="2000" overflowToDisk="false" timeToLiveSeconds="86400" eternal="false">
    <cacheEventListenerFactory
     class="net.sf.ehcache.distribution.jms.JMSCacheReplicatorFactory"
     properties="replicateAsynchronously=true,
                 replicatePuts=true,
                 replicateUpdates=true,
                 replicateUpdatesViaCopy=true,
                 replicateRemovals=true,
                 asynchronousReplicationIntervalMillis=1000"
      propertySeparator=","/>
  </cache>
  <cache name="UDPCache" maxElementsInMemory="100" overflowToDisk="false" timeToLiveSeconds="86400" eternal="false">
    <cacheEventListenerFactory
     class="net.sf.ehcache.distribution.jms.JMSCacheReplicatorFactory"
     properties="replicateAsynchronously=true,
                 replicatePuts=true,
                 replicateUpdates=true,
                 replicateUpdatesViaCopy=true,
                 replicateRemovals=true,
                 asynchronousReplicationIntervalMillis=1000"
      propertySeparator=","/>
  </cache>
</ehcache>

ai_analysis.purpose: EhCache distributed caching configuration for enterprise application using JMS-based replication

components.name: cacheManagerPeerProviderFactory
components.description: JMS-based cache replication configuration using ActiveMQ as broker

components.name: EhCacheReplicationActiveMQInitialContextFactory
components.description: Custom ActiveMQ JNDI initial context factory for cache replication

business_rules.description: Cache replication must use JMS for reliable distributed communication
ActiveMQ broker connection parameters must be externalized

performance_notes: JMS replication may impact cache operation latency
Connection pool settings should be tuned based on load
Cache size and eviction policies should be configured appropriately

debug_insights.code_quality: Good - follows EhCache best practices for distributed caching
improvement_suggestions: Add error handling for broker connection failures
